TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlPersonalizationProvider extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider

summary.span: 實作使用 Microsoft SQL Server 的個人化提供者。

span.span: Implements a personalization provider that uses Microsoft SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別會定義必要的功能，使用 Microsoft SQL Server 的個人化提供者。This class defines the required functionality for a personalization provider using Microsoft SQL Server. 個人化提供者載入和儲存個人化資料，代表執行個體。A personalization provider both loads and stores personalization data on behalf of a instance. 這個類別會實作的邏輯讀取和寫入到執行 SQL Server 的電腦，也會實作所有抽象方法定義於。This class implements the logic for reading from and writing to computers running SQL Server, and also implements all the abstract methods defined in . 如需有關個人化提供者的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on personalization providers, see . 使用 SQL Server 中的 Web 組件個人化的資料設計依賴兩個常見 SQL 資料庫資料表存在，其支援預存程序，共用大部分的 SQL 為基礎的功能實作。The data design for using Web Parts personalization with SQL Server relies on the existence of two common SQL database tables, and their supporting stored procedures, that are shared for most SQL-based feature implementations. 這些資料表和檢視已安裝並使用下列指令碼解除安裝：These tables and views are installed and uninstalled using the following scripts: - installpagepersonalization.sql-安裝個人化資料表、 檢視和相關的預存程序。installpagepersonalization.sql - Installs the personalization tables, views, and related stored procedures. - uninstallpagepersonalization.sql-解除安裝個人化資料表、 檢視和相關的預存程序。uninstallpagepersonalization.sql - Uninstalls the personalization tables, views, and related stored procedures. 請務必注意，如果您的 Web 應用程式無法在執行的預設信任層級無法個人化或更高版本 (您可以設定自訂的信任層級，在 Web.config 檔案中使用``項目)。It is important to be aware that personalization will fail if your Web application does not run at the default trust level of or higher (you can set custom trust levels in a Web.config file using the `` element). 並信任層級檢查這兩個類別初始化的時間。The and classes both check for a trust level of when they are initialized. 如果您設定您的應用程式執行的信任層級，以及您使用預設來管理您的應用程式的個人化資料提供者會第一次應用程式嘗試存取個人化資料失敗，因為 ASP.NET 背景工作處理序中執行信任並沒有必要呼叫中的各種類別的權限命名空間。If you configure your application to run at a trust level of , and you use the default provider to manage the personalization data for your application, the first time that the application tries to access personalization data, it will fail because an ASP.NET worker process running in trust does not have the permissions necessary to call into the various classes in the namespace.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式由 ASP.NET 呼叫來建立的執行個體類別做為應用程式組態中指定。The constructor is called by ASP.NET to create an instance of the class as specified in the configuration for the application. 這個建構函式不是從您的程式碼使用。This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.

.property instance string ApplicationName
Public Overrides Property ApplicationName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ApplicationName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ApplicationName : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的名稱，以儲存和擷取個人化資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application to store and retrieve personalization information for.

value.span: 要儲存和擷取個人化資訊的應用程式的名稱。

span.span: The name of the application to store and retrieve personalization information for.

value.span: 預設為目前 的 屬性值。

span.span: The default is the property value for the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性由群組的使用者資訊的類別。The property is used by the class to group user information. 限定名稱與應用程式名稱的使用者資訊，您可以在單一資料庫中儲存多個應用程式的資訊不會重複的使用者名稱之間發生衝突。By qualifying user information with an application name, you can store information for multiple applications in a single database without running into conflicts between duplicate user names. 此外，多個 ASP.NET 應用程式時，可以藉由指定相同的值中使用相同的使用者資料庫屬性。Also, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user database by specifying the same value in the property. 屬性可以設定以程式設計的方式，或它的 Web 應用程式使用的組態檔中可以宣告方式設定`applicationName`屬性中``一節。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application using the `applicationName` attribute in the `` section. 如果未指定值`applicationName`Web 應用程式組態檔中的屬性則使用應用程式所做的第一個要求的屬性值。If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file for the Web application, then the property value for the first request made to the application is used. > [!CAUTION] > 因為所提供的所有要求都使用單一預設個人化提供者執行個體物件，您可以有多個要求同時執行，而且嘗試設定屬性值。Because a single default personalization provider instance is used for all the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 屬性不是安全執行緒的多個寫入，以及變更屬性值可能會導致非預期的行為，應用程式的多個使用者。The property is not thread-safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 建議您避免程式碼，以讓使用者能夠設定屬性才。It is recommended that you avoid code to allow users to set the property unless required. 應用程式的範例設定屬性可能需要管理多個應用程式的個人化資料的系統管理應用程式。An example of an application where setting the property might be required is an administrative application that manages personalization data for multiple applications. 這類應用程式應該是單一使用者應用程式並不是 Web 應用程式。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application.

exception.span: 已將屬性設為長度大於 256 個字元的字串。

span.span: The property was set to a string with a length greater than 256 characters.

summary.span: 根據指定的範圍和參數，傳回包含零或多個 衍生物件的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection containing zero or more -derived objects, based on the specified scope and parameters.

returns.span: ，含有零或多個 衍生物件。

span.span: A containing zero or more -derived objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的項目組受到`pageSize`並`pageIndex`參數，其中`pageSize`控制要傳回的記錄數目和`pageIndex`控制傳回哪些記錄。The set of returned items is constrained by the `pageSize` and `pageIndex` parameters, where `pageSize` controls the number of records to return and `pageIndex` controls which records to return. 比方說，`pageIndex`為 0， `pageSize` 25 個會傳回前 25 個相符項目，雖然`pageIndex`為 1 和`pageSize`25 個會傳回出現 26 50。For example, a `pageIndex` of 0 and a `pageSize` of 25 would return the first 25 occurrences, while a `pageIndex` of 1 and a `pageSize` of 25 would return occurrences 26-50. 如果您想要擷取所有可用的記錄，設定`pageIndex`為 0，並`pageSize`至。If you want to fetch all available records, set `pageIndex` to 0, and `pageSize` to . -衍生的物件會傳回依字母順序排序和，兩者以遞增順序。The -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order sorted by and , both in ascending order. 此方法會查詢萬用字元的字元傳遞至基礎資料存放區。This method passes query wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 目前相依於每個提供者如何處理字元，例如星號 （\*）、 百分比符號 （%） 或底線 (_) 萬用字元的支援。Support for wildcard characters is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 一般來說，針對 SQL 相容的資料存放區，您可以執行萬用字元搜尋部分的路徑包含萬用字元，不會出現在開頭、 結尾或搜尋字串中的文字中間屬性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要尋找開頭的所有路徑 」\~/approot"，則屬性會設定為"\~/approot%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "\~/approot", the property would be set to "\~/approot%". 同樣地，部分的使用者名稱的萬用字元搜尋可能會出現在任何時間點的文字字串中的萬用字元屬性。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要尋找所有的使用者名稱開頭的"John"，參數會看起來像"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the parameter would look like "John%". 適用於下列的查詢條件約束：The following query constraints apply: - 如果只有`scope`提供，並`query`是`null`上的所有屬性或`query`傳回`null`或預設值，則比對所指定的所有記錄`scope`參數會傳回。If only `scope` is provided, and `query` is `null` or all the properties on `query` return either `null` or default values, then all records matching the indicated `scope` parameter are returned. - 如果屬性不是`null`，傳回的記錄也會比對的篩選根據的路徑屬性值。If the property is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on paths that match the property value. - 如果屬性不是`null`，傳回的記錄也會篩選根據的使用者名稱符合屬性值。If the property is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on user names that match the property value. - 如果屬性不等於，則傳回的記錄也會篩選為傳回與非作用中使用者相關聯的記錄。If the property is not equal to , then the returned records are also filtered to return only those records associated with inactive users. 比較包含記錄所在屬性小於或等於屬性。The comparison includes records where the property is less than or equal to the property. 請注意，這個方法不會驗證查詢參數的組合。Note that this method does not validate combinations of query parameters. 比方說，程式碼可以要求一組共用範圍中的特定使用者名稱相關聯的個人化狀態記錄。For example, code can request a set of personalization state records associated with a specific user name in the shared scope. 因為使用者名稱不是共用的資訊與相關聯，則傳回的集合會是空白。Because user names are not associated with shared information, the returned collection would be empty. 有可能會傳回空集合的參數組合包括：Parameter combinations that have the potential to return a non-empty collection include: - 結合的範圍。 scope in combination with . - 範圍中的任何或所有的值組合， ，和屬性。 scope in combination with the values for any or all of the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法會查詢萬用字元的字元傳遞至基礎資料存放區。This method passes query wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 目前相依於每個提供者如何處理字元，例如星號 （\*）、 百分比符號 （%） 或底線 (_) 萬用字元的支援。Support for wildcard characters is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 一般來說，針對 SQL 相容的資料存放區，您可以執行萬用字元搜尋部分的路徑包含萬用字元，不會出現在開頭、 結尾或搜尋字串中的文字中間屬性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要尋找開頭的所有路徑 」\~/approot"，則屬性會設定為"\~/approot%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "\~/approot", the property would be set to "\~/approot%". 同樣地，部分的使用者名稱的萬用字元搜尋可能會出現在任何時間點的文字字串中的萬用字元屬性。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要尋找所有的使用者名稱開頭的"John"，參數會看起來像"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the parameter would look like "John%". 適用於下列的查詢條件約束：The following query constraints apply: - 如果只有`scope`提供，並`query`是`null`上的所有屬性或`query`傳回`null`或預設值，則比對所指定的所有記錄`scope`參數會傳回。If only `scope` is provided, and `query` is `null` or all the properties on `query` return either `null` or default values, then all records matching the indicated `scope` parameter are returned. - 如果屬性不是`null`，傳回的記錄也會比對的篩選根據的路徑屬性值。If the property is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on paths that match the property value. - 如果不是`null`，傳回的記錄也會篩選根據的使用者名稱符合屬性值。If the is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on user names that match the property value. - 如果屬性不等於，則傳回的記錄也會篩選為傳回與非作用中使用者相關聯的記錄。If the property is not equal to , then the returned records are also filtered to return only those records associated with inactive users. 比較包含記錄所在屬性小於或等於屬性。The comparison includes records where the property is less than or equal to the property. 請注意，這個方法不會驗證查詢參數的組合。Note that this method does not validate combinations of query parameters. 比方說，程式碼可以要求在共用範圍中的非作用中使用者相關聯的狀態記錄的計數。For example, code can request a count of state records associated with inactive users in the shared scope. 因為沒有任何概念的非作用中的自訂項目，傳回的計數會是零。Because there is no concept of inactive customizations, the returned count would be zero. 有可能會傳回空集合的參數組合包括：Parameter combinations that have the potential to return a non-empty collection include: - 結合的範圍。 scope in combination with . - 範圍中的任何或所有的值組合， ，和屬性。 scope in combination with the values for any or all of the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法提供的初始化程序使用 SQL database 中的個人化，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method provides the initialization procedures for using personalization with a SQL database and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

summary.span: 根據指定的參數，載入基礎資料存放區中的個人化資料。

span.span: Loads personalization data from the underlying data store, based on the specified parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用`webPartManager`， `path`，和`username`參數做為擷取索引鍵。This method uses the `webPartManager`, `path`, and `username` parameters as retrieval keys. 傳回的資料包含：The returned data contains: - 中傳回資料`sharedDataBlob`參數。The data returned in the `sharedDataBlob` parameter. - 根據索引鍵值中傳回資料`userDataBlob`參數。Depending on the key values, data is returned in the `userDataBlob` parameter. 為非`null`值`userName`參數會指示也擷取資料。A non-`null` value for the `userName` parameter indicates that data is also retrieved. 物件會自動更新中的資料行`aspnet_Users`從頁面要求的內容中的資料庫載入每個階段的特定使用者個人化資料的資料表。The object automatically updates the column in the `aspnet_Users` table each time user-specific personalization data is loaded from the database in the context of a page request. 此行為可讓其他的 ASP.NET 功能，來使用屬性管理資料失效時記錄，以及決定站台上最近的使用者活動。This behavior allows other ASP.NET features to use the property when managing stale data records as well as determining recent user activity on a site.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void ResetPersonalizationBlob (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager webPartManager, string path, string userName);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void ResetPersonalizationBlob(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager webPartManager, string path, string userName) cil managed
protected: override void ResetPersonalizationBlob(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPartManager ^ webPartManager, System::String ^ path, System::String ^ userName);
override this.ResetPersonalizationBlob : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager * string * string -> unit

span.span: The managing the personalization data.

param.name: path
param.span: 個人化資訊的路徑，此個人化資訊在 範圍中做為擷取金鑰之用。

span.span: The path for personalization information in the scope to be used as the retrieval key.

param.name: userName
param.span: 個人化資訊的使用者名稱，此個人化資訊在 範圍中做為擷取金鑰之用。

span.span: The user name for personalization information in the scope to be used as the retrieval key.

summary.span: 刪除基礎資料存放區中的個人化資料。

span.span: Deletes personalization data from the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法可從資料庫刪除網站使用者選擇重設頁面上的 Web 組件資料的個人化資料。 uses this method to delete personalization data from the database when a Web site user chooses to reset Web Parts data on a page. 如果`username`是非`null`，使用的資料領域資料已遭刪除; 否則資料領域刪除。If `username` is non-`null`, data with the scope data is deleted; otherwise, data with the scope is deleted. 物件會自動更新中的資料行`aspnet_Users`每次使用者專屬的個人化資料從頁面要求的內容中的資料庫中刪除的資料表。The object automatically updates the column in the `aspnet_Users` table each time user-specific personalization data is deleted from the database in the context of a page request. 此行為可讓其他的 ASP.NET 功能，來使用時管理過時的資料記錄，以及決定站台上最近的使用者活動的值。This behavior allows other ASP.NET features to use the value when managing stale data records as well as determining recent user activity on a site.

span.span: The user names for personalization information in the scope to be deleted.

summary.span: 根據指定的參數，刪除基礎資料存放區中的個人化狀態資訊。

span.span: Deletes personalization state information from the underlying data store, based on the specified parameters.
The number of rows deleted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所不支援任何萬用字元。No wildcard characters are supported by this method. 允許參數的下列組合：Only the following combinations of parameters are allowed: - `scope`參數設定，而所有其他參數會設定為`null`。The `scope` parameter is set, and all other parameters are set to `null`. 這個組合會刪除所指定的個人化範圍相關聯的所有 Web 組件個人化資料`scope`。This combination deletes all Web Parts personalization data associated with the personalization scope indicated by `scope`. - `scope`參數設定，而`paths`參數包含至少一個值。The `scope` parameter is set, and the `paths` parameter contains at least one value. 這個組合會刪除指定的路徑或路徑所指定的個人化範圍中的所有 Web 組件個人化資料`scope`。This combination deletes all Web Parts personalization data for the specified path or paths that are in the personalization scope indicated by `scope`. - `scope`參數設定為，則`paths`參數設定，而且包含只有一個路徑，而`usernames`參數包含至少一個值。The `scope` parameter is set to , the `paths` parameter is set and contains only one path, and the `usernames` parameter contains at least one value. 這個組合會刪除所有的使用者個人化 Web 組件中所包含的使用者相關聯的指定路徑的資料`usernames`。This combination deletes all user personalization Web Parts data for the given path that is associated with the user or users contained in `usernames`. - `scope`參數設定為，則`paths`參數`null`，和`usernames`參數包含至少一個值。The `scope` parameter is set to , the `paths` parameter is `null`, and the `usernames` parameter contains at least one value. 這個組合會刪除所有的每一使用者個人化 Web 組件的資料，在中所包含的使用者相關聯的所有路徑之間`usernames`。This combination deletes all per-user personalization Web Parts data, across all paths, associated with the user or users contained in `usernames`. 任何其他的參數值組合無效，而且將會擲回例外狀況。Any other combination of parameter values is invalid and will throw an exception. 比方說，不允許下列兩種組合：For example, the following two combinations are not allowed: - `usernames`不能提供參數時`scope`參數設為。The `usernames` parameter cannot be provided when the `scope` parameter is set to . - `paths`參數不能包含多個項目時`usernames`參數不是`null`。The `paths` parameter cannot contain more than one entry when the `usernames` parameter is not `null`. `paths`和`usernames`包含於各自陣列參數必須符合以下驗證規則。The `paths` and `usernames` parameters contained within the respective arrays must meet the following validation rules. 如果任何驗證規則失敗時的參數陣列中，任何成員擲回例外狀況。If any validation rules fail for any member of the parameter arrays, an exception is thrown. 驗證規則包括：The validation rules include: - `null` 不允許值。`null` values are not allowed. - 空字串 ("") 不允許字串已修剪。An empty string ("") after the string has been trimmed is not allowed. - 包含在沒有使用者名稱`usernames`參數可以包含逗號。No user names contained in the `usernames` parameter can contain commas. - 中的任何路徑長度`paths`參數不能大於 256 個字元。The length of any path in the `paths` parameter cannot be greater than 256 characters. - 中的任何使用者名稱的長度`usernames`參數不能大於 256 個字元。The length of any user name in the `usernames` parameter cannot be greater than 256 characters.

exception.span: 或 參數是空白陣列。

span.span: Either the or the parameter is an empty array.
\- or -

exception.span: 包含於各自陣列中的 和 參數不符合驗證規則。

span.span: The and parameters contained within the respective arrays do not meet the validation rules.

exception.span: 指定的 不是 列舉的成員。

span.span: The specified is not a member of the enumeration.

param.name: path
param.span: 要刪除之個人化資料的路徑。

span.span: The path of the personalization data to be deleted.

param.span: 這個值可以為 ，但是不能為空字串 ("")。

span.span: This value can be but cannot be an empty string ("").

param.name: userInactiveSinceDate
param.span: 指示上一個活動的資料。

span.span: The date indicating the last activity.

summary.span: 根據指定的參數，刪除基礎資料存放區中的使用者個人化資料。

span.span: Deletes user personalization data from the underlying data store, based on the specified parameters.

returns.span: 從基礎資料存放區刪除的資料列數目。

span.span: The count of rows deleted from the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的參數具有下列限制：This method's parameters have the following restrictions: - `path`參數不能包含萬用字元。The `path` parameter cannot contain wildcard characters. - 如果`path`參數為非`null`，然後與相關聯的唯一的每一使用者個人化資料錄`path`將被刪除。If the `path` parameter is non-`null`, then only per-user personalization records associated with `path` will be deleted. - 只有每位使用者個人化資料錄會被視為非作用中指定的日期後的使用者相關聯`userInactiveSinceDate`參數會被刪除。Only per-user personalization records associated with users that are considered inactive since the date specified in the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter will be deleted. 確切的比較會刪除記錄所在屬性小於或等於`userInactiveSinceDate`參數。The exact comparison would be to delete records where the property is less than or equal to the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter. - 如果未提供這兩個參數，則會刪除符合這兩個條件約束的記錄。If both parameters are provided, then records that match both constraints are deleted. - `path`參數可以是`null`。The `path` parameter can be `null`. - `path`參數無法於修剪後為空字串。The `path` parameter cannot be an empty string after trimming. - 屬性不能是 `null`。The property cannot be `null`.

exception.span: 為空字串。

span.span: is an empty string.
\- or -

exception.span: 路徑的長度大於 256 個字元。

span.span: The path is greater than 256 characters in length.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void SavePersonalizationBlob (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager webPartManager, string path, string userName, byte[] dataBlob);

span.span: The managing the personalization data.

This value cannot be .

param.span: 範圍中用做索引鍵之個人化資訊的使用者名稱。

param.name: dataBlob

summary.span: 將未經處理的個人化資料儲存至基礎 Microsoft SQL Server 資料庫。

span.span: Saves raw personalization data to the underlying Microsoft SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果非`null`提供使用者名稱，則`dataBlob`參數會包含個人化資料範圍; 否則`dataBlob`會假設包含資料範圍。If a non-`null` user name is provided, then the `dataBlob` parameter contains personalization data for scope; otherwise, `dataBlob` is assumed to contain data for scope. 物件會自動更新中的資料行`aspnet_Users`每次使用者專屬的個人化資料會儲存到資料庫的頁面要求的內容中的資料表。The object automatically updates the column in the `aspnet_Users` table each time user-specific personalization data is saved to the database in the context of a page request. 此行為可讓其他的 ASP.NET 功能，來使用屬性管理資料失效時記錄，以及決定站台上最近的使用者活動。This behavior allows other ASP.NET features to use the property when managing stale data records as well as determining recent user activity on a site.
